about_the_game:
What is Golgothica?

• Golgothica is a survival horror dungeon crawler with elements from the immersive sim genre.

• It is a first person sci-fi horror game, with emphasis on puzzle solving and exploration as well as deep combat mechanics.

• Venture into the vast labyrinthine asteroid mining colony orbiting the planet Golgotha V and unravel the mystery and horror of what has transpired.

• Create a unique character and solve problems in your own fashion.

• Choices matter, but only if you want them to matter. Help other survivors, or leave them to their own fate…

• Golgothica will be developed in unreal engine 5.4 and will be available for PC (windows).

• Golgothica will initially be available in English.

Follow along with the development by joining the discord and seeing the latest devlogs as soon as they are published.

Golgothica has a focus on exploration and problem solving, whilst giving you the player the opportunity to test your skills with emergent combat mechanics against the horrors you encounter. Utilizing a wide variety of tools and weapons, you will be able to approach both combat and environmental hazards and puzzles your own way. Each playthrough will be different.

Build your character to suit your play style. Find tools, armor and useful items in the deep dark to boost your chances of survival. Upload your genetic data into the memory banks of the station to partially save your progress, giving you the choice to apply your old stats to a new character or start from scratch.
